channel.title: Comments on: So I played DmC
channel.description: Game ideas, lame ideas, and more

item.title: By: Terry
item.dc:creator: Terry
item.description: But, hey, he sure can pull it off, huh?
item.content:encoded: But, hey, he sure can pull it off, huh?

item.title: By: Mad Dog
item.dc:creator: Mad Dog
item.description: Devil May Cry is like that popular guy at a party with the expensive haircut and slick jacket that I can't stand.
item.content:encoded: Devil May Cry is like that popular guy at a party with the expensive haircut and slick jacket that I can't stand.
